description:
go.tools/go/types: typecheck call arguments even if the call doesn't typecheck

This provides better partial type information in case of type errors.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8b4fa298221e&repo=tools ***

go.tools/go/types: typecheck call arguments even if the call doesn't typecheck

This provides better partial type information in case of type errors.

R=r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/9835049
